alert.note: Alert for Johnston; Wayne; Wilson (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 09 at 3:25PM EDT until May 09 at 4:15PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: The National Weather Service in Raleigh has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Wayne County in central North Carolina... Southwestern Wilson County in central North Carolina... Eastern Johnston County in central North Carolina... * Until 415 PM EDT. * At 324 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Clayton, or 12 miles north of Smithfield, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Smithfield, Clayton, Fremont, Micro, Selma, Pine Level, Kenly, Princeton, Pikeville and Nahunta. This includes Interstate 95 near Mile Marker 92, and between Mile Markers 93 and 114. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
